page.title: Interview: Dell's Rollins lays out a road map, from services to AMD (InfoWorld)
page.text: InfoWorld - After eight years at the company, Kevin Rollins was appointed president and CEO of the #36;41.4 billion computer juggernaut Dell Computer last July. Many still think of Dell as a desktop supplier, but the company has become a powerhouse in server and notebooks as well and is making strong moves in the printer and storage markets.
